title: Paddington's sticky situation; Bear-Hugged; Paddington meets the Queen
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode of Series "The wonderful world of Paddington Bear". In "Paddington's Sticky Situation", the very rich and super friendly Marmalade King makes Paddington the guest of honour at his party. Then Paddington accompanies the Browns to the local fair and gets into a wrestling match in "Bear-Hugged". However, when Paddington discovers that Queen Elizabeth shares his love of marmalade, he immediately heads for Buckingham Palace in "Paddington meets the Queen". Based on the beloved books by Michael Bond and features the voice of Tim Curry. All episodes are written by Gordon Kent with the exception of "Paddington meets the Queen" which was written by Alison Bingeman.
